page.title: 11THE GAS PIPELINE,COTEHILL
page.content: Last year a gas pipeline was built. There was already a pipe line carring gas from Aberdeen to Manchester but this one leaves it at Longtown and goes on to Manchester . Lots of under groWth was pulled up and when you walked along the pipeline, the dust was up to your ankles. The pipeline was built by Macalpines. Every day convoys of lowloders, land rovers,JCBs and welding machines went past making a right racket .Macalpines were based at Cocklakes old factory in our block .Now the pipeline is over you can see hedges starting to grow where it had been dug up.
